Text: Best performance? No way! Watch The Searchers, that is his greatest performance.

This was fabulous!  Thanx a million. 

The remake sux--the  Coen brothers are unconscionable hucksters. 

The acting in the original--even from non-actor Glen Campbell--was ten times better than the awful remake.  As much as I love Jeff Bridges, it was like he had marbles in his mouth.
